summary:
Board Certified Consultant Radiologist since 2018.
Specialised in Neuro & Head and Neck Radiology.
Achievement of European Diploma in Radiology (EDIR) and European Diploma in Neuroradiology (EDINR). 
Special interest in preventive and integrative medicine.
Trained in medical education and research. 
Trained in personal and medical leadership.
Longterm board experience in Dutch and European Board of Radiology.
Experience in sales and brand promotion.
Internationally oriented with an extensive network, strong social and cross-cultural skills. 

English 		Fluent (Academic IELTS 85%)
French		Mother Tongue (currently C1)
Dutch		Mother Tongue
German		Basic working knowledge B1

certifications.name: Hybrid Imaging Nuclear Medicine - Oncologic FDG-PET/CT

publications.name: Comparing two artificial intelligence software packages for normative brain volumetry in memory clinic imaging

authors.headline: Professor of Population Imaging at Erasmus MC
FEI Strategy and Innovation Consultant at Team
Professor of Applied Physiological Neuroimaging at Erasmus MC

profile_positions.description:
Services:
•	Consultant Radiologist
Choose for exclusive whole-body imaging reporting and ultrasound expertise, customised for GP practices, private health clinics and preventive health screening centres.

•	Teleradiology Consulting
Experience the top quality of allround radiology reporting 24/7 in Dutch, English, German or French. GMC-registered and trained in RECIST clinical trials.

•	Orthomolecular Consultation
Create a personalised plan for health improvement and prevention of disease that is tailored to your needs and wishes, including nutrition, fitness and lifestyle.
profile_positions.title: Founder & CEO

profile_positions.description: Focus on oncologic chest-abdomen CT and MRI including RECIST clinical trials.
profile_positions.title: Consultant Radiologist

profile_positions.description:
•	Fulltime neuro/head-neck fellowship. 
•	Erasmus Medical Center is one of the largest tertiary neuro-oncology centres of the Netherlands, with focus on research and multimodality imaging of gliomas and especially glioblastomas (prof. M. Smits). 
•	Focus during this fellowship on TNM staging and follow-up of head and neck cancers, including naso-, oro- and hypo-pharyngeal & laryngeal malignancies, skull base and temporal bone tumors (prof. A. van der Lugt). 
•	Temporal bone imaging (dr. Tanghe).
•	Dementia imaging with additional experience with use of Artificial Intelligence device Quantib (prof. M. Vernooij). 
•	Participation in research project with Quantib resulting in publication in Neuroradiology journal.
•	Active leading role in neuro- and head/neck oncology multidisciplinary meetings and education to residents and interns.
•	Multiple successfully finished courses (TMC fellowship Zoran Rumboldt, Skull base congress ESHNR, Erasmus MRI course head/neck, ASNR).
•	Achieved Fellowship Certificate from Dutch Radiological Society (NVVR).
profile_positions.title: Fellowship Diagnostic Neuro / Head & Neck Radiology

profile_positions.description:
•	General radiologist with emphasis on neuro- and breast radiology. 
•      Set up education for neuroradiology residents. 
•	Breast mammography incl. tomosynthesis and stereotaxic procedures and breast ultrasound incl. punctures and biopsies. 
•	Broad peripheral working experience in CT and MRI of head, neck, chest, abdomen and musculoskeletal (MSK), X-ray of chest/MSK and ultrasound of abdomen, neck and MSK.
•	Additional experience in Forensic Radiology (collaboration with NFI - Dutch Forensic Institute).
•	Achieved European Diploma in Neuroradiology (EDINR).
profile_positions.title: Consultant Radiologist

profile_positions.description: Focus on reporting over 300 Oncologic PET-CT to get additional nuclear radiology degree.
profile_positions.title: Fellowship Nuclear Radiology

profile_positions.description: Focus on HRCT scans of interstitial lung disease (prof. J. Verschakelen).
profile_positions.title: Fellowship Thoracic Radiology - ESOR/ESTI-sponsored

profile_positions.description:
•	Working as the only radiologist on the island. CT, X-ray, mammography and ultrasound available.
•	Extensive experience in emergency radiology due to vast amount of acute and clinical cases. 
•	Providing radiology education to general practitioners and other medical specialists.
profile_positions.title: Locum Consultant Radiologist

profile_positions.description:
•	Half of the year was devoted to subspecialty neuro and head/neck imaging.
•	Focus on skull base, orbital and sinonasal pathology, laryngeal cancers and temporal bone imaging (prof. Verbist).
•	Experience in structured performing and reporting ultrasound of the neck, mainly for head and neck cancers and thyroid pathologies. Including punctures and biopsies.
•	Achieved European Diploma in Radiology (EDIR, dec 2017).
profile_positions.title: Neuro / Head & Neck Radiology subspecialty

profile_positions.description: Gain additional experience in newest breast imaging techniques and protocols under supervision of L. Wijers.
profile_positions.title: Internship Breast Radiology

volunteer_experiences.role: Board member European Diploma in Radiology
volunteer_experiences.description:
Responsible for providing educational content from Emergency and Neuroradiology cases on mobile and desktop app. 
Lecturing during ECR about EDIR.

•	Organising Neuroradiology educational day 2016.
•	Active participation in numerous committees: Onderwijs, Sandwich Cursus, Regionaal Cursorisch Onderwijs, Vrest, Nieuw Website.
•	Representative of Dutch delegation in International Radiology Training Forum.
•	Representative of Radiology delegation in De Jonge Specialist.
•	Active participation in multiple training hospital audits.
Reviewing articles on suitability for the journal and their content before publishing.
Talent Class including business case preparation focused on healthcare management and future improvement.
Organising the biennial national medical conference MIC.

volunteer_experiences.role: Board Member SCORA (Standing Committee on Reproductive Health incl AIDS)
volunteer_experiences.description:
Providing sex education in secondary schools.
Responsible for sponsorship and recruitment for benefit conference IFMSA.
Recording audio books for the visually impaired (fiction, non-fiction, educational, NL/ENG/FR).
Providing outdoor Latin Dance workout classes for adults and their kids, at first started during Covid pandemic lockdowns and continued afterwards.
One season of travel guide and ski instructor for kids age 10-16 from schools in the Netherlands. Based on several location in the Austrian alps.
